name: Trump Run - Help Donald Trump to get Vote & Find his Wife
name_original: Trump Run - Help Donald Trump to get Vote & Find his Wife
description:
Donald Trump is lost in the Jungle. He need to find his Wife and also collect vote.

Donald Trump need more votes for his precidentcy campaign. Here is how you can help him:

- Help Donald to go as far as he can
- Collect all the bananas (votes) along the way
- Avoid all obstacles (Clinton and other candidates)
- The more votes and the further he can run the better

Have fun and help donald trump.
